patthana3.14:156.1_1: Araṇo anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo araṇassa anidassanaappaṭighassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.14:157.1_0: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare samanantare cattāri, sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe dve, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte pacchājāte āsevane dve, kamme cattāri, vipāke ekaṁ, āhāre indriye jhāne magge cattāri, sampayutte dve, vippayutte tīṇi …pe…
patthana3.14:161.1_0: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṁ, evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
